overview.summary: Manipulate how scalar particle data is mapped to color.

description.p: This module allows to user to adjust the range of data over which the colormap spans. If the "Auto Scale" button is selected then color is mapped to the entire data range. If "Fixed Scale" is selected, then color is mapped to the range specified by the min and max entries. If you have simulation data that spans several timesteps, you will want to use fixed with values that represent the data range for all of the data, thus the colors will represent the same values across time steps.
